root.name: Super Street Fighter II: The New Challengers
root.description: OverviewSuper Street Fighter II: The New Challengers is the fourth version of Street Fighter II, developed by Capcom. Super SFII was the first game to be launched on Capcom's CPS-II arcade hardware and so the game features improved graphics and sound, but it also adds four new characters.CharactersReturning charactersRyuKen MastersE. HondaChun-LiBlankaZangiefGuileDhalsimBalrogSagatVegaM. BisonNew charactersCammyDee JayFei LongT. Hawk
